library.description: FlipPage is powerful jQuery plugin to create the illusion of turning pages of book, basically this plugin is developed for presentation on touch pad. Plugin uses HTML5-CSSS3 and hardware acceleration and work also in mobile browser. FlipPage plugin keeps the page flip effect inside/over the images displayed (gives you 2D- experience).
library.name: Flippage

library.description: Flipping HTML elements to show a loading indicator easily.
library.name: Flipload.js
